para: 作家的艺术沃尔德雅努茨扎克探讨革命成果的印象派画家。在第一集中，沃尔德探讨背后的故事四个最有影响力的印象派画家莫奈，毕沙罗，雷诺阿和巴齐尔-谁一起奠定了基础，艺术运动。他发现了什么样的社会和文化的影响，使他们的绘画风格，他们是如何联合，最终他们的挑战和改变艺术永远。名称: 印象派:绘画与革命 The Impressionists - Painting and Revolution导演: Susan Doyon编剧: Waldemar Januszczak类型: 纪录片 / 历史制片国家/地区: 英国语言: 英语上映日期: 2011-11-8片长: 60minsArt writer Waldemar Januszczak explores the revolutionary achievements of the Impressionists In the first episode, Waldemar delves into the back stories of four of the most influential Impressionists - Pissarro, Monet, Renoir and Bazille - who together laid the foundations of the artistic movement He finds out what social and cultural influences drove them to their style of painting, how they were united and how ultimately they challenged and changed art forever（原文）
